title: HANDUP hucks it into the holidays with new cold weather gloves
content:
HANDUP is rearing to get riders ready for the brisk winter cycling season with a new line of cold-weather gloves. These mitts pop just as much as their usual offerings but add more insulation. HANDUP is known for their fun, vibrant line of gloves that feature bright designs and slogans for the rider that wants

The post HANDUP hucks it into the holidays with new cold weather gloves appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
